DOC.brief_title: Study 2 Doses Solifenacin Succinate Female Subjects With Overactive Bladder .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants satisfy selection criterion end 2-week , single blind , placebo run-in period randomize receive 12-week double-blind treatment solifenacin 5 mg 10 mg daily , placebo .
